overview: Even Lesbian Housewives need a distraction from the mundane job of keeping house, and what a better way than to cavort with your wife or lover instead of doing the dusting. A pair of newly-weds have their priorities right as they head straight up to the bedroom to consummate their union with a huge strap-on rather than clearing up the confetti and a rare night out sees three housewife pals letting more than just their hair down as they live out some of their most intimate lesbian fantasies. These housewives won't be chained to the sink, but perhaps their next fantasy will see them being bound, gagged and dominated. We'll just have to wait and see!
title: Lesbian Housewives
